item.title: Importance of Python
item.description: When I began taking this class, I was unsure about what I would be learning since I am not really good with coding. Although I still would not consider myself literate in coding, II feel like I learned enough basics to get by. I am really grateful I took this class and have been able to create something as cool as my own website. library(reticulate) hist(iris$Sepal.Length, xlab="Sepal Length (cm)", main= "Distribution of Iris Sepal Length", right = F, col = "blue") "This blog has been"-> rcode pyth= "great fun" print(r.
